com.droidcare.control

Class HomeTabsPagerAdapter

  • Object
    • FragmentPagerAdapter
      • HomeTabsPagerAdapter

  • public class HomeTabsPagerAdapter
extends FragmentPagerAdapter
    This class is responsible for handling switching between tabs and determines what to be displayed inside the selected tabs
    Author:
    Edwin Candinegara
